page.title: 11MARKET GARDENING
page.content: {Fruit,Vegetables and Fish. Some farms have land allocated for "pick-your-own"sales of fruits and vegetables.Many people come from {Lincoln}and the surrounding villages when the weather is fine to enjoy a day in the country where they pick and purchase their fruit. People in our villages travel into {Lincoln}to do their shopping in the big super markets but purchase local produce from the farms. There are also a few trout and and fish farms which breed fish and charge people to come and fish in their lakes. At{Scothern}there is a comercial plant nursery.In{Sudbrooke}people have started selling the very peaty soil.
